alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 2:46PM EST until February 23 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Prolonged period of light to moderate snow expected. Snow will become lighter after midnight tonight through Tuesday morning before becoming heavier Tuesday afternoon and evening. For tonight, 2 to 4 inches of snow expected. Locally higher amounts of 5 to 8 inches expected in the higher terrain west of Marquette. For Tuesday and Tuesday night, an additional 2 to 7 inches expected with locally higher amounts up to 10 inches in the higher terrain west of Marquette. * WHERE...Baraga and Marquette Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Periods of difficult travel is expected with impacts to evening and morning commutes tonight through Wednesday morning. Patchy blowing snow could reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
